name: Cosmic Kraken
description: Our first game we ever made, and was made for the Major Jam 4: Cosmic Jam. We had to learn a lot for this project, having to learn all of game development in one evening. We had great fun making this, and hope you can appreciate Caroline, the human saving Cosmic Kraken. Use your left mouse button to grab all the humans and throw them back into their spaceship. Play the game fullscreen!
